comment.author: 72133717@N05
comment._content: A copy of the entry relating to R R Inwood from the Australian Dictionary of Biography can be seen at abd.anu.edu.au/biography/inwood-reginald-roy-6795

comment.author: 64288588@N05
comment._content: UK Victoria Cross Medals database has the following: Name:Reginald Roy Inwood Birth Date:14 Jul 1890 Birth Place:Renmark, North Adelaide, South Australia Death Date:23 Oct 1971 Death Place:Tara Private Hospital, St Peter's, Adelaide Regimental number 506 10th Battalion (SA) Austalian Imperial Force Australia Birth Index shows his father as Edward Inwood and mother Mary Ann Minney born North Adelaide 14 Jul 1890. His Wikipedia entry is here en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roy_Inwood And www.anzacday.org.au additional details www.anzacday.org.au/education/medals/vc/details/inwood.html Service record details: www.awm.gov.au/units/people_564.asp www.aif.adfa.edu.au/showPerson?key=INWOOD/RR/506 shows Brothers: 320 Pte Harold ray INWOOD, 43rd Bn, returned to Australia, 10 September 1917; 1533 Sergeant Robert Minney INWOOD, 10th Bn, killed in action, 24 July 1916. Details of the action at Polygon Wood www.polygonwood.com/The%20Battle%20for%20Polygon%20Wood.htm
